Description:
Position Title:             Graphic DesignerEmployment Type:     FulltimeSalary:                         up to 10K AED depending on experience and qualificationJob Location:             Dubai, UAE About the Client:A sophisticated aesthetics clinic based in Dubai using top of the line care and technology. Job Responsibilities:Create visually appealing marketing collaterals for print, including brochures, flyers, posters, banners, etc.
Design engaging digital graphics for social media, website content, and email campaigns.
Maintain and update the healthcare facility's website with a focus on user-friendly layouts and accessibility.
Collaborate with the Marketing team to develop design strategies for various campaigns and initiatives.
Stay updated with design trends and industry best practices to ensure modern and competitive design elements. Skills
Skills:
Open to Arabic nationals
Male, 40 years old and below
Minimum 3 years of experience in the similar role
Immediate joiner will be prioritized
